Dynamic Mode (Optional)

If dynamic mode is enabled the home key positions are determined by where you place your fingers. To begin typing, place your fingers near the markers in the middle of the screen. Once you have placed three fingers, a hand will activate and you can start typing.

Two Hand layout

Single Hand layout

metaTags.description: Slice Keyboard's dynamic mode lets you adjust the position of the home row keys to where you place your fingers on the screen.
